content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage at Position (x=52.5, y=-84.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=53.0, y=-83.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=52.5, y=-84.5) storing coal

### Copper Ore Mining and Processing at Position (x=-23.0, y=-68.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-23.0, y=-68.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-23.5, y=-69.5) storing copper ore
- Transport Belts connecting the mining drill to the chest

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing at Position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5) storing iron ore
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-12.5, y=-54.5) storing iron ore
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-13.5, y=-54.5) transferring iron ore between chests

### Iron Plate Production at Position (x=-21.0, y=-62.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-21.0, y=-62.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-20.5, y=-63.5) storing iron plates
- Transport Belts connecting the furnace to the chest

### Copper Plate Production at Position (x=0.0, y=0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=0.0, y=0.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=1.5, y=0.5) storing copper plates
- Burner Inserter at position (x=2.5, y=0.5) transferring items between chests

### Iron Ore Distribution System
Consists of the following entities:
- Multiple Wooden Chests at positions (x=-15.5, y=-69.5), (x=-14.5, y=-64.5), (x=3.5, y=0.5) storing iron ore
- Burner Inserters at positions (x=-16.5, y=-69.5), (x=-15.5, y=-64.5), (x=2.5, y=0.5) transferring iron ore between chests
- Transport Belts connecting various chests and inserters

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into entities without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. For example, attempting to insert iron ore into a furnace without having iron ore in your inventory will result in an error.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
